author: bayard
msg: Pulled the configuation out of the nightl build script so it can be run in multiple places. This is mostly useful for debug. The vmbuild variant is a default, rather than having an error happen when no option is passed in. Also I have modified the script such that if there are do deploy or maven_ deploy parameters, it doesn't try to do this.

author: sebor
msg: (AR, ARFLAGS): Set to only invoke the archiver through the compiler.

author: jmsnell
msg: Simple example showing the dynamic extension API
